channel.title: Chicago Search on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Chicago Search on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Boston i will arrive in..
item.description: Tomorrow I will arrive in boston for search engine training. I am excited but rather bummed that I will be going. I don’t really want to leave chicago.. my friend miriam is leavign for cologne on sunday and I would like time to spend with her before she leaves.. alas.. I guess I will have to wait and spend time later.. but that is why it sucks.. cuz later she will be in germany.
